section.title: IBM XIV and DS8000 volume driver
section.para: The IBM Storage Driver for OpenStack is a Block Storage driver that supports IBM XIV and IBM DS8000 storage systems over Fiber channel and iSCSI.
Set the following in your cinder.conf, and use the following options to configure it.

note.para: To use the IBM Storage Driver for OpenStack you must download and install the package available at: http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/selectFixes?parent=Enterprise%2BStorage%2BServers&product=ibm/Storage_Disk/XIV+Storage+System+%282810,+2812%29&release=All&platform=All&function=all

section.para: For full documentation refer to IBM's online documentation available at http://pic.dhe.ibm.com/infocenter/strhosts/ic/topic/com.ibm.help.strghosts.doc/nova-homepage.html.
